header.title: Emathuluzi eSalatiso e-OHS
sidebar.step_0.title: üìú Wamukelekile Emathuluzini eSalatiso e-OHS
sidebar.step_0.description: Buka emathuluzi etfu lanekwane kanye netinsita tekutfutfukisa kuvikeleka kwebulungiswa emsebentini wakho.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ‚ö° Ngabe wati kwekutsi kusebentisa baphakeli labanobulungisa bangakhona kunciphisa tingoti emsebentini ngekucinisekisa kwekutsi umsebenti wenziwa ngesikhatsi kantsi ngemazinga aphezulu nekubukeka?
intro.title: Wamukelekile Emathuluzini eSalatiso e-OHS
intro.description: Buka emathuluzi etfu lanekwane kanye netinsita tekutfutfukisa kuvikeleka kwebulungiswa emsebentini wakho.
legal_obligations.client.title: Tibopho Temklayenti
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Construction Regulation 5(1)(a): Lungiselela Kuhlola Tingoti Kwesisekelo (BRA) lokubona tingoti temphahla.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Construction Regulation 5(1)(b): Nikezela Ngetincazelo Tebulungiswa Nekuvikeleka letichaza tidingo letikhethekile temphahla.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Construction Regulation 5(1)(l): Yamukela Lihlelo Lebulungiswa Nekuvikeleka Leklayenti ngaphambi kwekutsi umsebenti uqale.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Tibopho Temkontileka
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Construction Regulation 7(1)(a): Thumela Lihlelo Lebulungiswa Nekuvikeleka lelisekelwe etincazelweni teklayenti.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Construction Regulation 7(1)(b): Gcina Ifayili Lebulungiswa Nekuvikeleka endzaweni lenemibhalo yonkhe lefunekako.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Construction Regulation 9: Yenta Kuhlola Tingoti kanye Nekuhlola Tingoti (HIRA) letikhethekile emsebentini.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Tibopho Temsebenti Wekuvikeleka
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Construction Regulation 5(5): Emajenti (PrCHSA) alawule H&S egameni leklayenti, acinisekise kutsi kuyalandzelwa umthetho.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Construction Regulation 8(5): Ema-ofisa (CHSO) asite baphakeli ekusebentiseni nasekuhloleni tinhlelo te-H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Tinhlelo te-SACPCMP: Kumele agcine kubhalisa kanye netidzingo te-CPD temazinga ekusebenta.
wizard.step_0: Sicela ukhetse sikhatsi ukuze uqale inqubo.

wizard.step_9.description: Buyeketa lokukhetsile bese wengeza emabhalophetfo esitolo sakho kute utfole kukhamba phambili.
cart.title: Sitolo Sakho
cart.invoice_reference: Inombolo Yerefarensi Ye-invoice: (Isebenza emalanga lasikhombisa. Bhalisa kute ugcine unaphakade!)
resources.title: Tfolela Kubasebenti Bekuvikeleka Labavunyiweyo
resources.description: Ngabe udzinga lusito lwebungcweti? Tfolela kubasebenti labavunyiweyo ngetidzingo temphahla yakho.
resources.jane_doe: Jane Doe, Umajenti we-SACPCMP (PrCHSA) - Inombolo Yekubhalisa: PR12345 - Lokumele Akhulumisane Naye: jane.doe@example.com

footer.copyright: ¬© 2025 Emathuluzi eSalatiso e-OHS. Onkhe Emalungelo Agciniwe.
footer.newsletter.title: Hlala Ufundziswa
chatbot.response: Ngilapha kute ngikusite! Kute ufumane teluleko te-OHS letikhethekile, sicela utfolele umsebenti wetsembekile.
training.title: Kufundziswa Lokuphelele Kwendzawo Yemsebenti
training.description: Buka tinhlelo tetfu tekufundziswa kwendzawo yemsebenti letiphelele kute ucinisekise kwekulandzelwa kwemitsetfo ye-OHS yaseNingizimu Afrika bese ukhutsata indzawo yemsebenti leletiphephile. Khetsa kufundziswa lokusebenta ngetandla, kufundziswa kweqembu, noma usebentise i-wizard yetfu kute ufumane tindzaba letikhethekile letisekelwe kwindasteri yakho, bantfu labajoliswe kubo, kanye nendzawo.
training.wizard.start: Sicela ukhetse lokukhetsako kute uqale inqubo yesiphakamiso sekufundziswa.
training.wizard.step_1.title: Sigaba 1 kwesikhombisa 5: Khetsa Indasteri Yakho
training.wizard.step_1.label: Indasteri:
training.wizard.step_2.title: Sigaba 2 kwesikhombisa 5: Khetsa Bantfu Labajoliswe Kuto
training.wizard.step_2.label: Bantfu Labajoliswe Kuto (Khetsa Tonkhe Letisebentako):
training.wizard.step_2.error: Sicela ukhetse okungenani bantfu labajoliswe kuto labanye.
training.wizard.step_2.option_emergency_: Licephu Lesimomozomnandi (Baniketi Belusito Lwekuqala, Bachemi Bemlilo)
training.wizard.step_3.title: Sigaba 3 kwesikhombisa 5: Chaza Indzawo Yakho
training.wizard.step_4.title: Sigaba 4 kwesikhombisa 5: Tinchazelo Letinwet≈°iwe
training.wizard.step_5.title: Sigaba 5 kwesikhombisa 5: Buyeketa Kufundziswa Lokunconyiwe
training.wizard.step_5.description: Ngokusekelwe kulokufakiwe, nangu tinhlelo tekufundziswa letinconyiwe. Khetsa letotowutjengisa esitolo sakho.
training.cart.title: Sitolo Sakho Sekufundziswa
training.cart.customization.title: Chaza Emathuluzi Akho Ekufundziswa
training.cart.customization.first_aider_: Sicela ufake ligama lemniketi welusito lwekuqala.
training.cart.customization.emergency_li: Sicela ufake inombolo yekukhulumisana ngesimo sesimomozomnandi lesebentako (sib., +27123456789).
training.cart.compiled_by.title: Lihlanganiswe Ngu
training.cart.training_type.title: Indlela Yekufundziswa
training.cart.training_type.label: Khetsa Indlela Yekunikezela:
training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: Isaziso se-SafetyHelp: Emathuluzi ekufundziswa laniketwe anelusito lokwati kuphela futsi awameleli teluleko tebungcweti. Kute ufumane tindzaba te-OHS letikhethekile, sicela utfolele i-SafetyHelp ku support@safetyhelp.co.za noma uvakashele Likhatsi Lekukhulumisana.
training.checkout.success: Inkhokhelo iphumelele! Emathuluzi akho ekufundziswa ahlelwe. Landza li-PDF lakho ngezantsi. Kute ufumane kufundziswa ku-inthanethi, emakhodi ekungena atfunyelwe kuwe nge-imeyili.
training.providers.title: Baphakeli Bekufundziswa Labavunyiweyo
training.providers.description: Ngabe udzinga kufundziswa kwemunye? Tfolela kubaphakeli bekufundziswa labavunyiweyo ngetidzingo takho.
training.providers.provider_1: ABC Training Solutions - Ivunyiwe Yi-SETA - Ikhethekile Elusitweni Lwekuqala, Kucima Umlilo - Lokumele Akhulumisane Naye: info@abctraining.co.za
training.providers.provider_2: SafeSkills Academy - Ibhaliswe Ku-SACPCMP - Ikhethekile Ekuphepheni Kwakha - Lokumele Akhulumisane Naye: training@safeskills.co.za
training.providers.provider_3: SafetyHelp Training - Kufundziswa Lokuphelele kwe-OHS - Lokumele Akhulumisane Naye: support@safetyhelp.co.za
training.manual.purchase.title: Tfola Imanuwali Yekufundziswa Leyingakhandlwa
training.manual.purchase.description: Tfola imanuwali yekufundziswa lephakeme lehlanganiselwe inkampani yakho, lehlanganisa tidzingo temthetho, ematfuba lanekhono lekhampani ngokusekelwe kweprofayili yakho yengoti, kanye netindleko tebaphakeli bekufundziswa labavunyiweyo.
training.manual.risk_profile.title: Chaza Iphrofayili Yakho Yengoti Yemanuwali Yekufundziswa
training.manual.risk_profile.label: Iphrofayili Yengoti:
training.selection_method.title: Khetsa Indlela Yakho Yekufundziswa
training.legal_fact.step_1: Linani Lemthetho: Umthetho we-OHS Sigaba 8 udzinga kwekutsi baphatsi banikete kufundziswa lokukhethekile etingotini letikhethekile tendzawo yemsebenti.
training.fun_fact.step_2: Linani Lelikhatsatako: Ngabe wati kwekutsi kufundziswa lokuvamile kunganciphisa tinhlelo tendzawo yemsebenti kuze kufike ku-30%?
training.legal_fact.step_3: Linani Lemthetho: Emkhandlu wendzawo angaba nemithetho ye-OHS leyehlukahlukene lekhona letingakukhona tidzingo tekufundziswa.
training.fun_fact.step_4: Linani Lelikhatsatako: Tindzawo temsebenti letinengoti lephezulu njengemasayithi ekwakha tidzinga kufundziswa lokuvamile kute kugcinwe emazinga ekuphepha.
training.legal_fact.step_5: Linani Lemthetho: Umthetho we-OHS uyawucacisa kufundziswa lokukhethekile kwetindzima letifana nebameleli be-SHE kute kucinisekiswe kwekulandzelwa kwemthetho.
legislation.title: Umthetho we-OHS Nekulawula Ingoti
legislation.description: Yenta umthetho we-OHS kanye nelihlelo lekulawula ingoti lelihlelelwe libhizinisi lakho. Faka imiminingwane yenkampani yakho, imisebenti, kanye netingoti kute ufumane umbiko lophelele wekulandzelwa lokuhlanganisa umthetho waseNingizimu Afrika, imitsetfo yomasipala, kanye nemigomo yemhlaba.
legislation.wizard.title: Yenta I-RMP Yakho
legislation.wizard.step_1.title: Sigaba 1 kwesikhombisa 4: Imiminingwane Yenkampani
legislation.wizard.step_2.title: Sigaba 2 kwesikhombisa 4: Imisebenti
legislation.wizard.step_2.label: Khetsa Imisebenti (Khetsa yonkhe leyisebentako):
legislation.wizard.step_3.title: Sigaba 3 kwesikhombisa 4: Tingoti
legislation.wizard.step_3.label: Khetsa Tingoti (Khetsa yonkhe leyisebentako):
legislation.wizard.step_4.title: Sigaba 4 kwesikhombisa 4: Buyeketa Nekwenta
legislation.wizard.step_4.description: Buyeketa lokufakiwe futsi wenta i-RMP yakho. Ungangeza umthetho longeziwe uma udzingeka.
legislation.cart.title: Inkhokhelo
legislation.cart.description: I-RMP yakho yentiwe! Sebentisa ikhodi yevawut≈°ha FREERMP2025 kute ulande mahhala (bantfu bokuqala labali-100).
suppliers.title: Luhlu Lwabaphakeli be-OHS
suppliers.description: Tfola futsi ubeke baphakeli be-OHS eNingizimu Afrika. Sesha ngekutsi ungakhona, tinsiza, kanye nemvumo. Thumela tibuyeketo kute usize labanye benze tinqumo letinelwati.
suppliers.list.title: Luhlu Lwabaphakeli
suppliers.table.name: Ligama Lemphakeli
suppliers.review_form.title: Thumela Tibuyeketo
community_tools.title: Emathuluzi Ekuphepha Kwemphakatsi
community_tools.description: Bika noma ngusiphi sihlelo sekuphepha noma ingoti emphakatsini wakho noma endzaweni yakho yemsebenti, kusukela emigodini kute kufike etintfweni letingasebenti kahle. Sebentisa emathuluzi etfu kute ucinisekise kuphepha etindzaweni letifana nemitolo ye-spaza, tikolo, tibhedlela, kanye netindzawo tekudlela.
community_tools.incident_report.title: Bika Sihlelo noma Ingoti
community_tools.incident_report.descript: Chaza sihlelo noma ingoti (sib., umgodi kuMain Street, sicephu lesephukile esikhungweni semphakatsi)...
community_tools.incident_report.user_soc: I-Handle Yakho Yetindzaba Temphakatsi (Lokukhetsako, sib., @username ku-X):
community_tools.incident_report.provider: Faka ifoni noma i-imeyili (itawugcwalwa ngokuzenzakalela uma umphakeli ukhetsiwe)...
I-Handle Yetindzaba Temphakatsi Yemphakeli Wensita (Lokukhetsako, sib., @CityofJoburgZA ku-X):
Faka i-handle ye-X (itawugcwalwa ngokuzenzakalela uma umphakeli ukhetsiwe)...
community_tools.list.title: Lamanye Emathuluzi Ekuphepha Kwemphakatsi
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.title: Luhlu Lwekuvikeleka Kwesitolo Se-spaza
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.descript: Cinisekisa kwekutsi sitolo sakho se-spaza siyahlangabetana netidzingo tekuvikeleka kwemlilo, kagesi, kanye nesitolo ngokwemigomo yomasipala kanye nemthetho we-OHS.
community_tools.list.school.title: Sichazamiso Sekuvikeleka Kwemlilo Wesikole
community_tools.list.school.description: Fundza tidzingo temthetho tekuvikeleka kwemlilo etikolweni, kuhlanganisa tinhlelo tekuphuma kanye nemathuluzi.
community_tools.list.hospital.title: Sichazamiso Sekulungiselela Simomozomnandi Setibhedlela
community_tools.list.hospital.descriptio: Cinisekisa kwekutsi tibhedlela tilungiselele simomozomnandi ngetinhlelo letifanele tekuphuma kanye nemathuluzi ekuvikeleka.
community_tools.list.tavern.title: Luhlu Lwekuvikeleka Kwetavern
community_tools.list.tavern.description: Hlola kwekutsi tindzawo tekudlela tiyalandzela umthetho wekuvikeleka kwemlilo kanye nekulawula bantfu kute kuvikelwe tinhlelo.
dashboard.title: IDashboard Yelilunga
dashboard.welcome: Wamukelekile, [Ligama Lemsebenti]! Lawula kulandzela kwakho kwe-OHS, li-RMP, tibuyeketo tebaphakeli, kanye nembiko yemphakatsi lapha.
dashboard.profile.title: Iphrofayili Yenkampani
dashboard.rmps.title: Li-RMP Letigciniwe

dashboard.rmps.title.document_categories.title: Hlanganisa Emabhalophetfo Eluhlelo Lwakho Lekulawula i-OHS
dashboard.rmps.title.document_categories.description: Khetsa futsi uhlanganise emabhalophetfo lotowadinga eluhlelweni lwakho lekulawula i-OHS. Khetsa etinchubomgomo, tinhlelo, emazinga, kanye naletinye, letihlelwe tidzingo temkhandlo wakho.
dashboard.rmps.title.document_categories.policies.title: Tinchubomgomo
dashboard.rmps.title.document_categories.policies.description: Tichazelo temazinga laphezulu temcako kanye nekutibophela, letivunywe ngemaphatsi laphezulu.
dashboard.rmps.title.document_categories.policies.infectious_: Inchubomgomo Yekuphendvula Ku-COVID-19 noma Tifo Letitsatsekanako
dashboard.rmps.title.document_categories.policies.ohs_perform: Inchubomgomo Yekusebenta, Tibuyeketo, kanye Nemacako kwe-OHS

dashboard.rmps.title.document_categories.procedures.descripti: Tichazelo tesinyatfo ngesinyatfo sekusebenta ngendlela lephephile nekungaguquki.

dashboard.rmps.title.document_categories.standards.descriptio: Emazinga angaphakatsi laphezulu lafana nemthetho noma emazinga endasteri, lachaza timo letilindzelekile noma kusetjentiswa.

dashboard.rmps.title.document_categories.standards.hygiene_fa: Emazinga Endzawo Yekuhlanzeka (tindlu tangasese, emanti, tindzawo tekuphumula)

dashboard.rmps.title.document_categories.registers_logs.descr: Emarekhodi labuyeketwa njalo kute alandzelwe futsi alandelwe.

dashboard.rmps.title.document_categories.permits.description: Tivunyelwa letilawulwako temisebenti lenengoti lephezulu noma leyekelwe.

dashboard.rmps.title.document_categories.records.description: Emabhalophetfo lagciniwe labonisa kusebentisa kanye nekulandzela umthetho.
